sentences.en: At about 4.30 p.m. Audrey arrived at the office.
sentences.cn: 大约下午4点30分，奥德丽到了办公室。

sentences.en: Daddy called and asked me to drop by his office.
sentences.cn: 爸爸打来电话让我去他办公室一趟。

sentences.en: Dan shares an office with Lisa.
sentences.cn: 丹和莉萨共用一间办公室。

sentences.en: Did you go to the office (= the office where you work ) today?
sentences.cn: 今天你去办公室了吗？

sentences.en: Felipe Gonzalez won a fourth term of office in Spain's election.
sentences.cn: 费利佩·冈萨雷斯在西班牙选举中获得第4次连任。

sentences.en: He called me to his office for a man-to-man talk.
sentences.cn: 他把我叫到他的办公室私下谈了谈。

sentences.en: He quit his job as an office boy in Athens.
sentences.cn: 他辞去了在雅典当办公室勤杂工的工作。

sentences.en: He sat on the two-seater sofa in the partitioned office.
sentences.cn: 他坐在用隔板隔开的办公室里的双人沙发上。

sentences.en: His office was in keeping with his station and experience.
sentences.cn: 他的办公室与其身份和阅历相称。

sentences.en: I ripped out the telephone wire that ran through to his office.
sentences.cn: 我把通到他办公室的电话线拔掉了。

sentences.en: Mick wants to see you in his office right away.
sentences.cn: 米克要你马上去他的办公室见他。

sentences.en: One of the office girls was down with the flu.
sentences.cn: 一位女职员得了流感。

sentences.en: Perhaps if you rang me when you got back to your office?
sentences.cn: 你回到办公室后给我打电话怎么样？

sentences.en: She was celebrating ten years in office.
sentences.cn: 她正在庆祝自己任职十年。

sentences.en: Sorry, Ann’s not in her office right now.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉，安现在不在办公室里。

sentences.en: The department occupies an office just a mile from the White House.
sentences.cn: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

sentences.en: The film opened to healthy box office receipts before rapidly falling off.
sentences.cn: 这部影片的票房收入开始的时候持续上涨，但是后来急剧下降。

sentences.en: the Foreign Office
sentences.cn: 外交部

sentences.en: The Foreign Office in London has expressed surprise at these allegations.
sentences.cn: 位于伦敦的英国外交部对这些说法表示惊讶.

sentences.en: the increased demand for office space
sentences.cn: 对办公室空间日益增长的需求

sentences.en: the manager’s office
sentences.cn: 经理办公室

sentences.en: There's always tons of scrap paper in Dad's office.
sentences.cn: 爸爸的办公室里总有大量的废纸。

sentences.en: When they leave school, they will be equipped for obtaining office jobs.
sentences.cn: 离校时，他们将有能力获得办公室工作的机会。

words.tran_cn: 军官，警官；公务员，政府官员；船长
使官方化；使成为正式；置在政府机关管辖下

phrases.tran_cn: 办公室，行政管理办公室
n. 办公室工作；事务；内业

trans.tran_cn: 办公室，办公楼，问询处，重要官职
trans.tran_en: a building that belongs to a company or organization, with rooms where people can work at desks
